DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY NEWSMAKERS : AVOCADO COMMISSION GETS TWO NEW VICE_PRESIDENTS
DOC.TEXT: Paul Larson , national merchandising director of the California Avocado Commission , has been appointed a vice_president of the Santa Ana organization.Larson joined the commission in 1991 from Del Monte Foods , where he was Western regional sales manager for food service and retail . In addition , Thomas Bellamore has joined the commission as vice_president . He will work with the legal counsels in Sacramento and Washington , oversee the international sales program , and be responsible_for the crop statistics program . Bellamore was formerly international marketing director of the USA Pea and Lentil Council of Moscow , Ida .
